text: Alleizettella is a genus of flowering plants in the family Rubiaceae. It is restricted to southeastern China and northern Vietnam. The genus commemorates French botanist Aymar Charles d'Alleizette.CRC World Dictionary of Plant Names: Common Names, Scientific Names, Eponyms ... by Umberto Quattrocchi == Species == * Alleizettella leucocarpa (Champ. ex Benth.) Tirveng. \- China and Vietnam * Alleizettella rubra Pit. \- Vietnam == References == == External links == *Alleizettella in the World Checklist of Rubiaceae Category:Rubiaceae genera Category:Gardenieae Category:Flora of Asia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Alleizettella
